What's the directory of the save files for this version?

After playing for the first time I saved my game and went back to the desktop. After a while I went back to my game and played for 2-3 minutes. Suddenly a textmessage arrives: "There was an issue saving the game. [ ] Retry [ ] Cancel". If I push "Retry" the message arrives again and again. If I push "Cancel" I can go on with playing, but if I try to open the menu the game freezes.
Have I done something wrong?

I had the same problem. I solved it by finding the folder containing the savegames, and editing its permissions. For some reason the folder was not writable, I just added "Everyone" and gave it full permissions. Probably not the safest option, but at least it works.
